text: @NYGovCuomo Who in their right mind would listen to the Trump adminstration regarding covid19. Listen to the scientists and doctors. Their advice and guidelines has not changed. The U.S. is all over the place. Look at the numbers compared to other countries. Our numbers are through the roof!
